text: Disney Jr. is a British-based Polish pay television preschool channel. It is owned and opeated by The Walt Disney Company Limited. == Programming == === Current programming === * Alice's Diary * Alice's Wonderland Bakery * Bluey * Daniel Tiger's Neighborhood * Dino Ranch * Disney Junior's Ariel * Earth to Luna! * Eureka! * Firebuds * Gigantosaurus * Kindergarten: The Musical * Kiya and the Kimoja Heroes * Mickey Mouse Clubhouse * Mickey Mouse Funhouse * Mira, Royal Detective * Morphle And The Magic Pets * Paprika * Pikwik Pack * PJ Masks * PJ Masks: Power Heroes * Puppy Dog Pals * Pupstruction * RoboGobo * Sofia the First * Spidey and His Amazing Friends * Star Wars: Young Jedi Adventures * SuperKitties * Tiny Beats * T.O.T.S. * The Chicken Squad * The Lion Guard * Unikitty! === Former programming === * 101 Dalmatian Street * 101 Dalmatians: The Series * Adventures in Wonderland * Aladdin * Albert Says...
